Content: A presentation on the operation ‘Barbarossa’ during the Quarter Master Officers Course 19 at Combat Training School (CTS), Ampara educated Officers and Other Ranks on Wednesday (6). The presentations were aimed at refreshing historical memories of the Operation ‘Barbarossa’. On this Occasion Brigadier P.A.D. Kahapola, Commandant, CTS, Ampara, Chief instructor, all Officers and Other Ranks attended the sessions and witnessed the presentation. Towards the end of the programme, an interactive question and answer session got underway, aimed at further enhancing their knowledge on the subject.
